title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Innovative Learning Design Based on Open Educational Quality Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms, foundational social studies understanding
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners design three innovative social studies learning modules utilizing open educational resources
Learners derive at least five learning design quality evaluation criteria through the application of the ISO/IEC 40180 quality model
Learners develop an open educational activity plan that maintains learner engagement above 80% in blended environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
